questionList.question: What will below code print at the end?
questionList.code:
try {
System.out.println(1);
System.exit(0);
System.out.println(2);
} finally {
System.out.println(3);
}
questionList.reason: Normally Finally block executes at end but due to System.exit(0) execution will stop

questionList.question: What will goHome return?
questionList.code:
static int goHome() {
try {
Exception e = new Exception();
throw e;
return -1;
} catch (Exception e) {
return -2;
} finally {
return -3;
}
questionList.reason: Return after throw is unreachable and will not compile
